original_text: Then you came back to Kadesh-Barnea. You wept to show the Lord that you were very sorry. But he would not listen to your prayers.
korean_text: 너희가 돌아와 여호와 앞에서 통곡하나 여호와께서 너희의 소리를 듣지 아니하시며 너희에게 귀를 기울이지 아니하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: Then you came back to Kadesh-Barnea.
You wept to show the Lord
But he would not listen to your prayers.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 너희의 기도를 듣지 않으셨다.
